description: Holland Code (RIASEC) narratives for PMERIT career assessment

R.name: Realistic
R.fullDescription: You prefer working with things - tools, machines, plants, or animals. You enjoy physical activity, solving concrete problems, and seeing tangible results from your work.
R.valueAt: Concrete results, working with objects, outdoor activities

I.name: Investigative
I.fullDescription: You enjoy thinking, researching, and solving complex problems. You're drawn to understanding how things work and prefer intellectual challenges over routine tasks.

A.name: Artistic
A.fullDescription: You value creativity, originality, and self-expression. You thrive in unstructured environments where you can innovate, design, and express ideas in unique ways.

S.name: Social
S.fullDescription: You enjoy helping, teaching, and supporting others. You're drawn to roles that involve interpersonal connection, counseling, and making a positive impact on people's lives.

E.name: Enterprising
E.fullDescription: You enjoy leading, persuading, and managing others. You're motivated by goals, status, and influence, thriving in competitive environments where you can drive results.

C.name: Conventional
C.fullDescription: You prefer structured work with clear rules and procedures. You excel at organizing information, following systems, and ensuring accuracy in data-driven environments.

RIA.narrative: You combine practical skills (Realistic) with analytical thinking (Investigative) and creative expression (Artistic). This unique blend suits technical roles that allow for innovation and hands-on problem-solving.

RIS.narrative: You blend hands-on skills (Realistic) with analytical thinking (Investigative) and a desire to help others (Social). You're suited for technical roles with a human impact.

RIC.narrative: You combine practical ability (Realistic) with analytical skills (Investigative) and attention to detail (Conventional). You excel in technical roles requiring precision.

RIE.narrative: You blend hands-on skills (Realistic) with analytical thinking (Investigative) and leadership drive (Enterprising). You're suited for technical management roles.

IAS.narrative: You're analytical and curious (Investigative), with creative expression (Artistic) and a desire to help others (Social). This suits research or design roles with human impact.

IAE.narrative: You combine analytical thinking (Investigative) with creativity (Artistic) and ambition (Enterprising). You're suited for strategic creative roles.

IAC.narrative: You're analytical (Investigative) with creative interests (Artistic) and organizational skills (Conventional). You excel at structured creative or research work.

ISA.narrative: You're analytical and curious (Investigative), motivated by helping and connecting with others (Social), and inspired by creativity and design (Artistic). This blend points to careers where problem-solving, collaboration, and creativity intersect.

ISE.narrative: You combine analytical skills (Investigative) with social orientation (Social) and leadership drive (Enterprising). You're suited for roles leading people-focused initiatives.

ISC.narrative: You're analytical (Investigative) with social skills (Social) and organizational ability (Conventional). You excel in structured helping roles.

ASE.narrative: You're creative (Artistic), people-oriented (Social), and ambitious (Enterprising). You thrive in leadership roles within creative industries.

ASC.narrative: You combine creativity (Artistic) with social skills (Social) and organizational ability (Conventional). You excel at organizing creative or educational initiatives.

SEC.narrative: You balance people skills (Social) with leadership drive (Enterprising) and organizational ability (Conventional). You're well-suited for management and coordination roles.

SER.narrative: You're people-oriented (Social), ambitious (Enterprising), and practical (Realistic). You excel in hands-on leadership roles.

SEA.narrative: You combine social skills (Social) with leadership (Enterprising) and creativity (Artistic). You thrive in creative leadership or people-focused design roles.

ECS.narrative: You're ambitious (Enterprising), organized (Conventional), and people-oriented (Social). You excel in structured business roles involving team leadership.

ECA.narrative: You combine ambition (Enterprising) with organization (Conventional) and creativity (Artistic). You're suited for creative business management.

CRI.narrative: You're organized (Conventional), practical (Realistic), and analytical (Investigative). You excel in technical roles requiring precision and analysis.

CRS.narrative: You combine organization (Conventional) with practical skills (Realistic) and social orientation (Social). You're suited for administrative roles supporting teams.

_default.narrative: Your Holland Code reflects a unique blend of interests that point to careers matching your combined strengths. Consider roles that allow you to leverage multiple aspects of your personality.

codeDescriptionTemplate: Your career type is {code}, indicating you are {adj1} ({code1}), {adj2} ({code2}), and {adj3} ({code3}).
